com.twitter.common.inject
Interface Bindings.BindHelper<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the type this helper can be used to bind implementations for
Enclosing class:
Bindings
public static interface Bindings.BindHelper<T>

A guice binding helper that allows for any combination of Class, TypeLiteral or Key binding without forcing guiced implementation to provide all the overloaded binding methods they would otherwise have to.

Method Summary
 com.google.inject.binder.LinkedBindingBuilder<T> with(com.google.inject.Binder binder)
          Associates this BindHelper with an Injector instance.
